mapper.insert: insert into house ( houseId, houseImage, houseVenue, houseDescription, ownerId, districtId, isAvailable ) VALUES ( #{houseId}, #{image}, #{venue}, #{houseDescription}, #{ownerId}, #{districtId}, #{isAvailable} )
mapper.delete: delete from favourite where houseId = #{houseId} and userId = #{email}
mapper.update: update house set houseImage =#{image}, houseVenue =#{venue}, houseDescription =#{houseDescription}, ownerId =#{ownerId}, districtId =#{districtId}, isAvailable =#{isAvailable} where houseId =#{houseId}
mapper.select: select favourite.houseId, houseImage, houseVenue, houseDescription, ownerId, districtId, isAvailable from house, favourite where favourite.userId = #{userId} AND favourite.houseId = house.houseId
select houseId, houseImage, houseVenue, houseDescription, ownerId, districtId, isAvailable from house where ownerId = #{userId}
